landing-page.title: Predict, participate and have fun
landing-page.subtitle: Novel on-chain, permissionless, and non-custodial Parimutuel Markets.
landing-page.description: Create, trade, and exercise binary options on Ethereum
landing-page.a1: Thales is an Ethereum protocol that allows the creation of peer-to-peer <bold>parimutuel markets</bold> that anyone can join. This building block is the foundation of novel on-chain initiatives, from <bold>order book based positional markets platform</bold> to <bold>survival betting games.</bold>
landing-page.a2: The set of smart contracts composing Thales leverages uncensorable <bold>sUSD as collateral</bold>, an immutable source of truth for market settlement from <bold>Chainlink</bold> data feeds, and all the advantages (speed, costs, and security) of a rollup-centric network like <bold>Optimism.</bold>
landing-page.a3:
<bold>Decentralization</bold> is key to resiliency.

 This is why <bold>ThalesDAO</bold>, as a collective, is the owner of the protocol and it conducts <bold>governance</bold> through the <bold>Thales Council<bold>, elected by THALES token holders.
landing-page.a4:
Because building on the right foundations attracts like-minded people who care deeply about the open finance vision.

 With the support of bright minds, talented souls, and passionate people from the Thales community the protocol gets iterated, battle-tested, and more resilient every day.

 We are on our way to becoming <bold>unstoppable.</bold>

markets.title: Binary Markets
markets.option1: Anyone in the world can participate in Thales binary options markets without any limitations.
markets.option2: Explore simple and intuitive derivatives with capped downside.

options.title: Trade Binary Options
options.option1: Binary options enable users to go long or short on specific outcomes based on price feeds.
options.option2: Know your odds, capture opportunities to profit on trends, or hedge risk on volatile assets.
options.option3: Trade, mint, and exercise binary options like never before!

get-started.title: To get started you'll need
get-started.second: Ether to pay for network fees (also called gas)
get-started.third: Synth USD (sUSD), which can be obtained directly from our dApp or by using

faq.title: FAQ
faq.firstA: The definition of a Parimutuel Market is a market where collateral is placed in a pool and final payout to participants is not determined until the market-settling event is finalized.
faq.secondQ: What type of collateral do Thales' Parimutuel Markets support?
faq.secondA: Thales smart contracts exclusively support sUSD, an uncensorable and decentralized stablecoin, as collateral. This stablecoin is the flagship product of Synthetix.
faq.thirdQ: What is the utility of the THALES token?
faq.thirdA: Thales DAO (THALES) governance token is a standard ERC-20 token used to govern the Thales protocol. These tokens grant the respective staker a right to participate in the Thales governance functions. In this way, THALES staker represents the foundation of every key decision relevant for the development of the protocol. Any additional utility of the token, that could be relevant to the protocol, can be decided and voted on by the protocols community governance structure.

staking-rewards.learn-more-text: Rewards are distributed weekly. If you dont claim in a given week, your rewards are carried over and made available to you for next week. Claimed rewards are subject to a 10 weeks vesting period. During the vesting period your escrowed amount will be included in your staked amount and thus effectively earning you more voting power and rewards.

create-market.title: Create a new Binary Options market
create-market.subtitle: To create a new binary options market select an asset, a strike price, and the market expiry date. You'll also have to select how many options tokens you will mint
create-market.note: * Note: The amount of sUSD deposited will dictate how many long and short options tokens will be minted. For example, depositing 1,000 sUSD mints 1,000 sLONG and 1,000 sSHORT options tokens for this market.

funding-amount.label: market funding amount:
funding-amount.desc: Note: your sUSD will be locked up in this contract until the market maturity date

create-market.min-amount: Please enter funding amount. Min {{ minimum }} sUSD is required.
create-market.insufficient-amount: Please ensure your wallet has sufficient sUSD.

summary.title: Market Summary
summary.difference: Difference between strike and current price
summary.note1: Earn 0.5% in sUSD of the total market size at maturity date, less the size of your initial deposit.
summary.note2: Pay zero Thales protocol fees for minting options tokens.
summary.note3: Pay Ethereum network fees (gas) when approving the market creation.

battle.optimism-timestamp-message: As the maximum rollup time to L1 on Optimism is 5 minutes, actions such as closing rounds that depend on timestamp can be delayed up to 5 minutes.

scoreboard.position-period: Time left for positioning in Round
scoreboard.question: Do you have what it takes to beat the competition and reach the final round?
scoreboard.info2: Thales Royale is a <bold>sequential winner-takes-all prediction game,</bold> played in 6 rounds.
scoreboard.info3: After the sign-up period finishes, participants are presented with a target price for an asset on a future strike date. They must <bold>predict if the actual price of the asset will be higher (△) or lower (◯) than the target price on said strike date.</bold>
scoreboard.info4: Those who guess correctly advance to the next round. Those who don't are eliminated. Players who reach and beat the final round split the whole prize pool.
scoreboard.info5: All the information, rules, and detailed rounds & prize structure can be found here:
scoreboard.info6: <italic>Good luck and let the battle begin!</italic>
scoreboard.thales-default: Thales: Binary options trading powered by Synthetix.

amm-mining.title: AMM rewards
amm-mining.subtitle1: The first batch of Thales markets on Optimism it's currently being incentivized with 20,000 THALES. This incentive will be distributed pro-rata based on volume to all AMM buyers.
amm-mining.subtitle2: This incentive will run until January 7th, 8:00am UTC. The THALES tokens rewards will be distributed as soon as the token is available on Optimism L2. For more information please read our blog post
amm-mining.subtitle3: You can check the expected amount of THALES rewards on the table below.
amm-mining.subtitle4: The results presented are provisional and subject to final corrections by Thales CCs and Thales Council

proposal.vote-confirmation: Are you sure you want to vote

optimism.info: As the maximum rollup time to L1 on Optimism is 15 minutes, actions that depend on timestamps can be up to 15 minutes delayed.

amm.return-tooltip: Potential profit if this option wins
amm.skew-tooltip: AMM will add a price impact on the side it is more exposed to
amm.max-limit-buy-tooltip: The maximum amount of {{currencyKey}} options for buying from AMM
amm.max-limit-sell-tooltip: The maximum amount of {{currencyKey}} options for sale to AMM
amm.amm-disabled-warning: AMM trading is disabled for this market
amm.explanation-text: <0>Thales AMM is a smart contract that aims to provide liquidity to Thales Binary Markets.</0><0>The AMM uses the BlackScholes algorithm to determine a realistic price for a binary option. Based on that price and the skew, which represents the AMM exposure to the market at hand, the AMM will offer to buy or sell quotes to traders.</0><0>Thales' AMM always aims to rebalance its exposure, so if more long options are being bought from the AMM than short, it will add a skew price impact to the long option pricing, while offering short options at base price.</0><0>As the AMM is in beta it has a cap (limit) per market and the amount of options that can be bought/sold at any time is limited. However, even if all options on one side are bought from the AMM, more liquidity will be made available as soon as a trader buys options of the opposite position.</0><0>Thales' AMM only supports trading on a market with calculated odds via BlackScholes above 10% and below 90% and up to 24 hours before market maturity to avoid edge cases and last-minute frontrunning.</0><0>More information about the AMM can be found here: </0><1 />
